current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

enrolled-dateline.#text:
Begun and held at the City of Washington on Friday, the third day of January, two thousand and
			 fourteen

congress.#text: One Hundred Thirteenth Congress of the United States of America

official-title.#text:
Authorizing the use of the rotunda of the United States Capitol in commemoration of the Shimon
			 Peres Congressional Gold Medal ceremony.

header.#text:
Use of the rotunda of the United States Capitol in commemoration of the Shimon Peres Congressional
			 Gold Medal ceremony

text.#text:
The rotunda of the United States Capitol is authorized to be used on June 26, 2014, for the
			 commemoration of the award of the Congressional Gold Medal to Shimon
			 Peres.

Physical preparations for the conduct of the ceremony described in subsection (a) shall be carried
			 out in accordance with such conditions as may be prescribed by the

role.#text: Clerk of the House of Representatives

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: SCON 37 ENR: Authorizing the use of the rotunda of the United States Capitol in commemoration of the Shimon Peres Congressional Gold Medal ceremony.
